comments.body: is there a path in kube that hits this?

@saschagrunert you've added this https://github.com/containernetworking/cni/pull/763, 
can you help me to answer this question :smile: ?

There was a setup race where the init container downloads the CNI Plugin binary (like Cilium) and the runtime immediately picks up the (not finished copying) executable on disk. This caused issues in multiple distributions on cluster bootstrap, so we added this feature of retrying.

I donâ€™t think that CNI invocations happen directly via Kubernetes, usually the runtime does this (last famous words).
